Key Match Events: Edson Álvarez scored a 101st-minute goal to save Mexico
Luis Chávez halved Honduras' aggregate lead with a late-first-half free kick
Mexico won an absurd penalty shootout
Post-Match Reflections: Mexico was falling, out of the CONCACAF Nations League, far away from the regional throne it once held
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took an almost unbelievable turn in the penalty shootout
Others: Mexico took a lead, via Santi Giménez and the fingertips of Luis Malagón
Honduran keeper Edrick Menjivar had tiptoed off the goal-line granting Huerta a retake
Mexico regularly sells out NFL stadiums coast-to-coast and Chicago-to-Houston
Without Mexico, the 2023 Nations League final, contested in Las Vegas by the U.S. and Canada, was half-empty
